headline: PLASMATHERM PECVD 790
keywords: pecvd plasma enhanced chemical vapor deposition  deposition
specstable:
Manufacturer Plasma-Therm
Model 790 PECVD 11"
Description PECVD Single Chamber 11" Electrode
Controller Type PC Controller Type
High Vacuum Pump None
Roughing Pump None
RF Generator Model RFPP 5S
Number of Gas Inputs Six Gas
Process Gases SF6, Ammonia, Nitrogen
Chillers
Number of Chillers 0
Accessories Resistive heated lower electrode up to 350 C, watlow temperature controller
Cooling/heating circuit in chamber walls
MKS throttle valve pressure control
VAT Al body gate valve assembly--ISO 100
2 torr manometer
Windows 98 Operating System
Process Gases--All MFCs will be cleaned and calibrated to NIST standards:
  • 2-N2 500sccm
  • 2-N2 1000sccm
  • 1-SF6 50sccm
  • 1-Ammonia 20sccm
Operating manuals and related documentation included.
Vacuum pump and chiller are not included.

Other Information
Refurbishment to Include and not Limited to:
  • Wet Clean of gas shower and process chamber
  • Cleaning and recalibration of MFCs is NOT included
  • Service of throttle and gate valves
  • Replacement of viewing windows
Power Requirements 208 V 60 Hz 3 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1998
Exterior Dimensions
Width 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Depth 40.000 in (101.6 cm)
Height 69.000 in (175.3 cm)
Weight 604 lb (274 kg)
